"Alan Dean" <alan.dean@...> writes:

> However, as Jon rightly points out, some representations are a subset
> of the resource, and so (by implication) even though the PUT is
> 'representation complete' it is not 'resource complete'. An example
> might be a PUT to a system that supports resource metadata with an
> alternate representation format.

Or PUTing formdata which describes a resource in the same way as the
POSTed formdata that created the resource.


-- 
Nic Ferrier
